channel.title: Coldplay
channel.description:
One of the most amazing bands of all time.
This isn't for the hardcore metal loving. Although, I think everyone can like this type of Alternative.
I for example, love rap music, Hip-hop, and maybe some grime, yet I'm attached to this music.
Download some of there songs, I reccomend:
Coldplay - Yellow Coldplay - Amsterdam Coldplay - Clocks Coldplay - Speed of Sound Coldplay - A message

item.title: Coldplay
item.dc:creator: @Exernet Exernet
item.description:
@Exernet wrote:

They have a very unique style, I like to listen to them while relaxing etc.

If you haven’t heard “don’t panic” and “fix you” I recommend you download them.

Read full topic
